data.title: 5 most exclusive night clubs in the world
data.meta_description: Clubs are some of the entertaining places to visit. But which are the MOST EXCLUSIVE NIGHT CLUBS in the world? What does it take for a club to rank up there?
data.text:
Are you looking forward to partying with celebrities in some of the world's most exclusive night clubs? Exclusive clubs are of a high standard with marvellous decor, beautiful location, and offer the best clubbing experience ever.

Much as they are not easily accessible to all and sundry because of their high entry charges and unspecified membership procedures, a brief description will divulge why they will give you the best clubbing experience. These places host the rich and mighty the world has.

5 most exclusive night clubs 2020

Which is the most exclusive club in the world? Below are some of the most exclusive night clubs you will come across. Some of the reasons why these places are outstanding range from their exemplary designs, location, and access procedures. Without further ado, here are the most upgraded and luxurious clubs in the world.

1. Pangaea, Singapore

Pangaea is an ultra-luxe lounge that sits beneath the casino complex of Marina Bay Sands (MBS). It is the home to Asia's most expensive cocktail, the Jewel of Pangaea, a hickory smoke-infused sugar cube, $32,000 worth of gold-flecked Hennessy brandy, and 1985 vintage Krug champagne, topped with a 1K diamond.

Its exclusive perks make it one of the most expensive dance clubs in the world to date. If you have loads of cash to blow, this is the place to go because you will spend from a minimum of $2,000 to $15,000 for a table. Nonetheless, it has opulent and richly adorned interior features, ostrich skin sofas, African tribal masks, and a 70,000 glass bulb ceiling.

READ ALSO: 10 richest Twitch streamers in 2020

Whereas the pub boasts of luxury, and well-decorated interior, it is not all about chilling. It has dance tiers in each banquette that encourage clientele to lose themselves in the music. You will certainly get the value of your money when you visit this place.

2. Casablanca Soul, Santorini, Greece

Casablanca is a lounge cocktail club in Fira. It is one of Europe's most expensive night clubs and a suitable place for party animals looking to hang out with friends.

It has a comforting setting, which includes a balcony that adds a bit of romance to the spice, and the focus is on the music. It is known for the music mixed by George K Tony, the resident DJ, and many world-class DJs. The club organizes live acts all through the summer.

The Casablanca Soul club is located on the rim of Fira's volcanic caldera - the hot spot for nightlife in Santorini. It opens at 10 pm and goes on until the early hours of the morning. A nice variety of cocktails are served at the bar, mixed by expert bartenders, and they are quite a hit with locals and newcomers.

3. Privilege, Ibiza

Which is the largest nightclub in the world? Ask anyone this question, and the name Privilege will come up. Despite being one of the oldest clubs to exist on Ibiza, the Guinness World Records officially recognized it as the largest nightclub in the world.

It was opened in 1978 and was initially known as KU Club between 1979 to 1995. The club is located close to the village of San Rafael, Ibiza, Spain.

It covers an area of 6500 meters squared and has a capacity of 10,000 clubbers. The entry price varies between €20 and €50. However, with layer upon layer of different entertaining places to explore, Privilege smashes down any existing boundaries you may already have for the clubbing experience.

4. Halikarnas, Turkey

Halikarnas was established in 1979. Before then, Turkey had never seen any club of its kind. Dubbed as one of the most exclusive night clubs in the world, Halikarnas continues to raise the bar for nightlife and entertainment in Turkey and the entire world.

READ ALSO: 20 richest musicians in Africa 2020

The club's unique atmosphere, columns, and majestic staircases facing the St. Peter's Castle and Aegean's blue waters have impressed generations of clubbers. The aesthetics are coupled with quality services, unique hospitality, great music, and timeless innovation, making it the best destination for clubbers worldwide as it is among the most luxurious nightclubs.

Halikarnas has hosted some of the biggest names in showbiz. They include Valentino, Pamela Anderson, Dustin Hoffman, Sir Mick Jagger, Sir Michael Caine, Yves Saint Laurent, Princess Margaret, Claudia Schiffer, Kid Rock, and Bette Midler.

5. Cavalli, Dubai

Cavalli club, restaurant, and lounge is an award-winning nightlife destination, and one of Dubai's most exclusive night clubs. Since its launch in 2009, Cavalli has become a glamorous venue and attracts numerous people.

This place's exciting part is its star-studded line up of international talent, from Akon and Sean Paul to Erick Morillo and Ferry Corsten, and a VIP guest list that has welcomed everyone from Jennifer Lopez to Will Smith.

READ ALSO: Top 10 richest kids in Africa 2020

The award-winning restaurant serves a refined Italian cuisine menu, while the sophisticated lounge offers expertly mixed cocktails, premium spirits, and an extensive list of the most exceptional vintage. It is open from 8.30 pm to 3 am, seven days a week.

Which is the hardest club to get into?

Clubs are indeed meant to be areas of refreshments or clubbing as many would like to put. But one club in Europe - Berghain, seems to have put all this aside and has something else to be identified with - being the hardest club to get into. Is it because of the overpriced party ticket? The answer is no!

Berghain is situated in a former East German power station. The club is famous for its world-class techno, hedonistic spirit, and now, its high-end culture. Whereas other things will help you get into the club, it is complicated to get into it because of the culture surrounding it.

Beginning as a gay, fetish, and techno club, Berghain shaped the "post-Wall" clubbing culture in Berlin. According to Sven Marquardt - the infamous Berghain bouncer, only a few guys can select guests at the door. The guests have to understand what the place is all about and its no photo policy.

There are plenty of excellent refreshing places to hang out or party at that you will be spoilt for choice. Some of the most exclusive night clubs are mentioned above. However, the list is long. Depending on where you are, you can always find a fantastic club to take your clubbing experience to a whole new level.

Tuko.co.ke published an article about the best rappers in the world. For the lovers of rap music, this is a compilation of best musicians in the game right now. Much as it is challenging to know who tops the list, names such as Eminem, Tupak, JayZ, and Kendrick Lemar featured in the list.

Music always becomes dated, which is something that happens with every generation. The best rappers in the world today may not be the best tomorrow. But for most people, hip-hop has an exception. Some artists have remained on top.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
